title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-4.21 - Reimbursement of municipal administrative costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-4.21 - Reimbursement of municipal administrative costs

State Regulations
(a) Municipalities shall be eligible for reimbursement for administrative costs. exclusive of due process costs, incurred during the preceding year pursuant to this Title. (b) The costs of direct early intervention services are not considered administrative costs. Administrative costs shall include personnel and operating expenses incurred for administration of the program. Notes
